togawasakikomod:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
togawasakikomod:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

togawasakikomod:MonochromeHairband.NAME: Monochrome Hairband
togawasakikomod:MonochromeHairband.FLAVOR: A black and white hairband symbolizing her will: an endless pursuit and desire for music.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, add a #yDesire

togawasakikomod:TheThirdMovement.NAME: The Third Movement
togawasakikomod:TheThirdMovement.FLAVOR: The music reaches its climax, and the story comes to an end.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b3 #yMoonlight #ySonata cards you play deal #b3 times damage.

togawasakikomod:ColorfulNotebook.NAME: Colorful Notebook
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yTogawaSakikoMod:Dazzling.

togawasakikomod:CuteAnimalBandAid.NAME: Cute Animal Band-Aid
togawasakikomod:CuteAnimalBandAid.FLAVOR: A box of assorted small animal-themed band-aids, perfect for healing bumps and bruises!
DESCRIPTIONS: When obtaining a reward after battle, heal #b1 HP.

togawasakikomod:FountainDrink.NAME: Vending Machine Drinks
togawasakikomod:FountainDrink.FLAVOR: You feel that this mystery machine contains mythical power, and only you don't quite know how to use it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your potion slots are full, gain a potion at the end of combat.

togawasakikomod:Maracas.NAME: Maracas
togawasakikomod:Maracas.FLAVOR: A mystical tool that could make even a wooden doll smile.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yTogawaSakikoMod:Hype.

togawasakikomod:MasqueradeMask.NAME: Masquerade Mask
togawasakikomod:MasqueradeMask.FLAVOR: An abandoned mask lay right on the floor. Seems cheaply made.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yTogawaSakikoMod:Purge 3 card during battle, gain a #yTogawaSakikoMod:Purge reward at the end of the battle.

togawasakikomod:TheCompass.NAME: The Compass
togawasakikomod:TheCompass.FLAVOR: Like the needle spinning between two poles of fate, our destinies align in its eternal dance.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your turn ends, you gain #b2 #yTogawaSakikoMod:Dazzling, all enemires gain #b1 #yTogawaSakikoMod:Dazzling.

togawasakikomod:TheDoll.NAME: The Doll
togawasakikomod:TheDoll.FLAVOR: There is nothing left but the warmth of her doll's embrace.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain #b2 #yTogawaSakikoMod:Hype.

togawasakikomod:WarmthInfusedPorcelainCu.NAME: Warmth-Infused Porcelain Cup
togawasakikomod:WarmthInfusedPorcelainCu.FLAVOR:
A reinforced tea cup for insulation.
The lid is tightly embedded and difficult to remove.
DESCRIPTIONS: Greatly increase the chance of apperance of #yHeart's #yBarrier.
